channel.title: Iphone
channel.description: So, my dad lost his iPhone, then got a new one. Then he found the one he lost, and will let me use it as long as we don't have to pay for the data plan. So if I just stick the sim card in from my old phone, and use the internet only on a wi-fi connection, we won't be charged for a data plan, right? (I know if I use the 3g network, I'll be charged.)

item.title: Iphone
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

You’ll have to jailbreak your iPhone, Im actually on it now lol. You can have almost any carriers sim, but jailbreak it first. Here’s a link on how to jailbreak it easily - http://www.readwriteweb.com/archives/how_to_jailbreak_the_iphone_to_firmware_312.php

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone

item.description:

What operator you with? (network)

who else has the iPhone besides AT&T?

o2, T-Mobie and Orange
[/quote]

Aren’t Vodafone rolling them out too?[/quote]
New news to me, but i hope so.
